level.heading: STORMWATER FEE DISCOUNT PROGRAM[COLON] DENIAL, REDUCTION, OR REVOCATION OFTORMWATER FEE DISCOUNT (§ 21-562)

level.text: The District Department of the Environment (Department) may make a decision to:
Deny an application for a discount or discount period, in whole or in part; and
Reduce or revoke a discount for a Best Management Practice’s nonperformance, its failure to retain the stormwater runoff volume for which a discount was approved.

The Department shall provide to the customer a notice of a decision, stating the basis for the decision and the customer’s right to dispute the Department’s decision, which may include a statement of:
The proposed denial, reduction, or revocation of a discount;
The requirement, if any, for an inspection or re-inspection; and
The customer’s right to appeal, as provided in this chapter.
The Department may extend the period for corrective action for good cause shown.
